function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Visiting urban parks and green spaces may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases and infections.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, regular cleaning and disinfection of public spaces, promotion of personal hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Contactless technology for access and transactions, UV-C disinfection systems, air purification systems.","People":"Visitors to urban parks and green spaces, local residents, tourists.","Owner":"Local authorities, park management, public health agencies."}]}
